column4: i'm trying to make some templates for nautilus. there used to be a temlate folder somewhere, but Go->Templates takes me to my home folder...
I believe all you need to do is create a Templates folder in your home.
yes, i have a file "test.html" in there but it doesn't appear when i right-click->Create Document. it says "no templates installed"
i did so, no effect. "no templates installed"
